wherein fat good wife child poore woman terrified heerewith knowing ran house pulling dore shutting wolfe among child last husband returned home vnto related accident shut vp wolfe man affraide cause least wolfe deuoured child entered hastily door longing saue deliuer poore infant feareful mother left wolfe came found al wel wolfe worse case astonished amazed daunted standing like stocke without sence able run awaie offering himselfe destroied first history second like vnto admirable great vnckle goblerus marueilously addicted hunting wilde beast lande diuers ditch trench cast vp pittes caues wrought verie artificiallie safe keeping beast fal hapned vpon one sabboth daie night fel one pit three creature diuers disposition aduerse inclination none able get thereof first neighbor wife poore woman going field gather beet rape hir meate day following fortuned fel downe mischance said pitte wherein faine lodge al night must thinke great anguish sorrow perillous daunger hir self beside hir husband family conceiued home tarried long said pitte ere fox vvas likewise taken fel dovvne vpon began griefe encreased fearing least wilde beast bite wound hauing meanes escape man helpe rescue although cryed loud euer could wherewithall wearied necessity made hir patient little comforted see foxe much affraid yet thought night ful long wishing breake day men stir abroad labor hoping would hear hir mone deliuer society chamber fellow thus thoght striuing betwixt hope feare griefe loe befell wofully suddenly wolfe taken fell downe vpon lost hope lamentable maner thinking husband child little conceiued extremity resolued forsake world commended soule god making reckoning distressed leane lims supper breakefast wolfe wishing might see husbande kisse child shee lost life sauage execution wish could preuaile cleare hart fear expectation vnauoidable death thus mused saw wolfe lie sitting one corner fox resting another wolf apaled much either boeth woman harme ill nightes lodging feare whereof almost wit earely morning came great vnckle hunter looke vpon trench pit taken comming vnto pitte found trebble prey woman wolfe fox whereat greatly amazed stepped litle backward first sight woman seeing cryed calling name praying aide knowing voice presently leaped dovvne pit valiant man vvith weapon first slue wolfe foxe deliuered vvoman feare yet forced leaue till went fetched ladder notable come foorth vvas hauing brought ladder went againe pit brought forth vppon shoulder manner deliuering safe husband family two story doe plainely set forth vvolfe dareth doe nothing hee feare himselfe tamed woluesit hath beene question whether vvolues tamed say alwaies wilde neuer tamed albertus writeth taken whelpes tamed wil play like dogges yet saith neuer forget hatered hunter desire lambes beastes deuoured vvolues whensoeuer goeth abroad stumpsius writeth euen tamed angry maisters looke vpon eat meat strabo writeth fable two wood among auncient veneti one dedicated iuno diana woulde make worlde beleeue therein vvolues liued peaceably gently harte come handes men like familiar tame dogges suffering themselues stroked hand aelianus stephanus doe say neare plaine meotis wolues vvhich liue like tame dogges men continually conuersant amonge fisherman wolues part stake deuide prey vvith inhabitant dwelling vpon seashore mutuall charitye common obserued betwixt men sometimes wolues take fish men take none part wolfe sometimes men take fish wolues haue none thus liue together quiet maner like confederats one releeuing helping men time break vvith wolus giue share recompence ingratitude falsehood tearing piece net thing true singular example rare concord agreement vvhich vvas primitiuely ordained god betwixt man beast say kind wolues bee otter hut rather beleeue seawolues whome wee shal talke presently many magical inuentions part wolues namely heades teeth eares tail priuy part wil stand recite place cannot tel benefit shal come knovvledge english reader vvolues subiect disease dog especially swelling throat madnesse gout sicke eat hearb make cast say ground iuy say grasse otherwise eate haue paine bellyes otherwisealbertus reason dog wolues subiect madnesse beast body chollerick braines encrease decrease moone man bitten madde wolfe cured medicine applyed bitings mad dogge liue long euen vntill loose teeth therefore old age oppressed famin fly vnto citties house seeke meat haue friend parrot wolfe part armes romethe wolfe hath friend parrot iudgment seat athens picture wolfe ancient coines mony stamped image wolfe among graecians among roman therefore deuised romulus remus said nursed wolfe skin wolues dressed currier read garmentes made withall great prince noble men cloathed bare inward next body rough outward vsed iournies hunting proper garment gaurds tyrant shall suffice vulgar wolfe seawolfe although nothing hath hitherto beene brought light concerning seawolfe ancient writer know yet form notable obserued may chuse whether wil cal theefe seamonster much differing wolfefish seemeth challenge particular description treatise also fourefooted beast liueth sea land satisfiing hunger part vpon fish hath bin seene vpon brittaine ocean shoare doth resemble wolfe liueth land vndeseruedly called among common people wolfe doth liue also long time tamed hath dangerous head many haires growing side eies shaddow nosthrils teeth like vnto dog strong haires growing mouth also smal bristle growing vpright vpon back adorned marked euery side black distinct spot long tailebellonius thick hairy al part like wolues may easily see expressed picture vnto belongeth story wolues last expressed liue vpon fish deuide familiarly men thoes two kind thoes panther differing onely magnitude greatnesse lesser thoes like vnto lesser pantherpliny licopanther lupus canarius engendered betwixt wolfe dogge one foure footed beast thoes also kind wolfeand bellu againe kind wolfe aristotle doth call chabez auicen doeth write ought called beruet persian tongue againe another place doth write lion thoes vtter enemy albertus doth translate wolfe doth fight fourefootedbeast toboz corrupted word toboz thoes cabez thohoz men think lynx thoes called haebrew tahas alshali fourefootedbeast like wolfe adeditach also kinde wolfe doe know whether name belong onely thoes kind wolfe solinus doth call thoas aethiopian wolues little sayd lycaon aethiopian wolfe mained necke diuers coloured man would thinke colour wanting people schythia likewise say buff doth change colour neither beast couered haire except lycaon among indian pliny also writeth besides mention made lycaon among ancient writer lycaons called dog story diuersities dogges lesser kind thoes best make two kinde thoes three like bird fourefootedbeastes change colour vvinter summer sometime appeare bare againe time rough ouer bare summer rough vvinter doth plainely seeme kind thoes one thing come doth proue make manifest nearchus saith tygers true tygers commonly called tiger changable thoes euery thoes changable greater thoes arrianthey haue reason take lupus ceruarius thoes wee haue already shewed lynx rhaecians speak italian sauoyans day call ceruario armenian vvolfe cicatus lupus canarius haue already shewed panther therefore needlesse stand longer vppon name place vvee therefore take confessed thoes beast engendered betwixt vvolfe foxe whereof greater smaller found mountaine pangeus cittus olympus myssius pindus nisa beyound syria resembling part hyaena hauing longer body straighter taile vvolfe although bee high stature yet nimble strong vvolfe seemeth name thoes taken celerity swiftnesse running leaping getteth liuing quicknesse foot outward face much resembleth vvolfe father spot length body resembleth panther mother couple generation like dog bringing forth two foure time like wolues blinde foot clouen many toe enimies lyon therefore doe liue place lyon onely liue vpon victual food also pittifull creature especially man see face man time run vnto reuerence brutish nature demonstrate philes selius write see man oppressed beast runne fight although lyon sparing offer owne liues spend dearest bloud defence secret instinct nature vnderstand ordained god king chiefest worldly creature therefore gratius calleth kind semiferam thoem de sanguine prolem taming fighting lyon speaketh thoes commissos leone et subiere astu et paruis domuere lacertis liue part vppon hart take swiftnes course bite sucke bloud sufferring runne away mountaines thether followe take second time destroying distance time whereby hart bloud groweth sweeter vnto haue better appetite thereunto destroy licopanthers also beast pathyon whereof albertus speaketh doe take two seuerall distinct beast thoes although quantitie stature agree see cause bee beast world wee may truly say lesser kind panther shall suffice haue said beast deemed bee kind wolues wherein haue endeuored say much generall especiall wee coulde collecte good author thus wee wyll shut vp storie woulfe short rememberance medicinall vertues midicines woulfe woulfe sodden aliue vntill bone doe remaine much commended paine goute liue woulfe steeped oile couered waxe also good disease skinne woulfe tasted bit mad rauenous dog doth preserue feare hazard falling water skinne woulfe profitable troubled wind collicke bound fast belley also person affected doeth sit vppon said skinne much auaile labouring trauailing man doth skinne woulfe feete shooes shall neuer paine trouble skinne woulfe new plucked especially hath naturall heat rowled member crampe verie effectuall bloud woulfe beeing mixed oyle profitable deafenesse eares dunge bloud woulfe much commended troubled collicke stone bloud bucke foxe woulfe warme taken drinke much force disease stone doth eate skinne woulfe well tempered sodden keepe euill dreames cause take rest quietlie flesh woulfe sodden taken meate doth helpe lunaticke flesh woulfe eaten good procreation child may read thing chapter going concerning remedy flesh woulfe taken meate fat woulfe lesse efficable flesh fat woulfe doth much profit anointed vppon whose ioyntes broken later writer wont mingle fat woulfe ointment disease goute also doe mingle ointment paulsey doth soften also vula anointed thereon also rubbed vppon eies profitable bleardnesse bloudshot eiesplinie sextus head also woulfe good weake sleepe vppon beeing layed vnder ther pillowe head woulfe burned ash speciall remedie loosenes teeth right eie woulfe salted bound body doth driue away ague ad feauers eie woulfe rubbed vppon eie doth diminish disease rise sight eie doth also take away al markes print made hot iron right eie wolfe also profitable troubled stiches right side belly left eye wolfe pain left side right eie wolfe good bitings dog also eye wolfe much commended lunaticke bitinges dogges teeth wolfe rubbed vpon gum young infant doth open whereby teeth may easier come forthslundus againe gum child loosened tooth dog gently rubbed theron sooner brought forth teeth wolfe men commend tongue wolfe bee eaten troubled falling sicknesse artery springeth throat wolfe taken drink certaine cure squincy throat wolfe taken drinke much commended troubled falling sicknesse lung light wolfe sodden dryed mingled pepper taken milke profitable puffed vp swollen belly heart wolfe burned beaten powder taken drinke doth help sicke falling sicknesse take one ounce gum oake halfe ounce gum peare tree two dram powder made top hart horne one dram hart wolfe al mingled togither made medicine alwaies vsed cure al vlcers wil effectual thou dost adde thereto hinder part skull man beaten powder lyuer wolfe lesse vertue lung light haue manifested medicine foxe liuer wolfe helpeth profiteth sick falling sicknesse liuer wolfe washed best white taken good disease arise liuer liuer wolfe mixed medicine made liuerwort much commended disease liuer galen also doth say hath holpen haue bin diseased liuer vsing medicine made liuerwort saith apply medicine thereto little nothing profit lyuer wolfe profitable troubled skurfe mouth lyuer lap wolfe much vsed troubled disease liuer must dry afterwards beat powder giue party affected one dramme sweet wine liuer lap wolfe saith marcellus dryed beaten powder little part mingled like portion powder made fene greeke lupine wormewood hearbe called herba mariae mingled may quantity cup full giuen day hee troubled feauer shall troubled let take water space three dayes hee hath drunke let lie space halfe houre armes spread abroad afterwardes let walk often eate sildome let sure keepe himselfe spact three day well ordered drinking cold drinke eating salor sweet thing within little space shall bee freed disease liuer lap wolfe wrapped bay leaues set dry sunne fire dryed beate powder morter first taking away leaues warily powdered must keepe cleane vessell giue drinke must adde thereto two leaues spoonewort tenne graines pepper beaten small much clarified hony needfull also made hot hot burning iron mingled diligently morter warmed must giue drinke sitting right vp bed hath taken potion may lye downe right side space houreauicen drawing knee together hee hath done let walke vp downe space houre likewise cure disease auicen doth set downe medicine concerning cure hardnesse liuer take opium henbane oyle made beauers stone myrrhe saffron spicknard agrimony lyuer wolfe right horne goat burneddioscorides equall partes make thereof medicine lyuer wolfe made forme dry electuary giuen lozeng doth also much profit disease liuer gugir phylosopher doth affirmegalen pliny lyuer liuing beastes doth much profit paine lyuer liuer wolfe througly dryed drunke sweete vvine doth mitigate griefes paine lyuer liuer beast quantity penny taken pinte sweete vvine medicinable curing paine liuer whatsoeuer liuer vvolfe taken hot vvine doth perfectly cure cough intollerable cough doth vex man let take liuer wolfe either dried burnt much shall thinke conuenient therewith let mingle vvine honny warme water afterward drinke fasting euery day quantity foure spoonefuls hee shall short space cured lap fillet vvolues liuer applyed vnto side doth perfectly heale sticth pricking ach therein liuer wolfe taken sweete wine doth heale troubled ptisicke lyuer vvolfe first boyled water afterwardes dryed beaten mingled certaine potion doth instantly heale griefe inflammation stomacke powder wolues lyuer mingled white wine drunke morning certaine day together doth cure dropsie liuer vvolfe taken either meat drinke doth asswage paine secret part two spoonefuls powder wolues lyuer giuen drinke doeth cure paine sore mouth gall vvolfe bound vnto nauell man doeth loosen belly gall vvolfe taken wine doth heale paine fundament entrals vvolfe washed best white vvine blowen vpon dryed ouensyluius albertus pounded dust afterwardes rowled vvormewood good effectuall remedy collicke stone part yard vvolfe baked ouen eaten either man vvoman instantly perfumemarcellus doth help troubled foule euill eye annointed excrementes wolfe instantly freed couers spreadi g skinne therein powder wolf mingled sweetest hony possible like manner rubbed spread vpon eye doth expell dazeling fime wolfe long rubbed vntill light mingled honny vnction thereofgalenus causeth filth scurfe growing eye auoyd away restoreth exceeding clearnesse powder wolues head rubbed vpon teeth doth make fast confirme loosenesse thereof certaine excrementes beastes certaine bone found bound vnto teeth haue force efficacy dung wolfe dogge beaten small powder mingled hony
